<title level="1" pfs="">[Swardlands Delinquent](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2100)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Swardlands Delinquent](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2100)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 15</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2), dagger; one delinquent carries a [crowbar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=18) and another carries a brush and pot of red paint

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 65

**Nimble Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The delinquent is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker she can see; **Effect** The delinquent gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="" />
club +11,
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="" />
dagger +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Quick Draw** <actions string="Single Action" />  The delinquent draws a weapon with an Interact action, then Strikes with the weapon they just drew.

**Rattling Blow**   Creatures the delinquent critically hits are [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and can't make reactions until the end of the delinquent's next turn.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The delinquent deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Swardlands Delinquent

text: Swardlands Delinquent Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 24 Unspecific Lore : DC 22 Specific Lore : DC 19 Swardlands Delinquent Source Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows pg. 15 Perception +8 Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +10, Athletics +9, Deception +8, Intimidation +8, Stealth +12, Thievery +12 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +1 Wis +0 Cha +2 Items Leather Armor, Club, dagger; one delinquent carries a crowbar and another carries a brush and pot of red paint --- AC 21 Fort +9 Ref +14 Will +8 HP 65 Nimble Dodge Reaction Trigger The delinquent is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker she can see; Effect The delinquent gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- Speed 25 feet Melee club +11, Damage 1d6+5 bludgeoning Ranged dagger +12 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+5 piercing Quick Draw Single Action The delinquent draws a weapon with an Interact action, then Strikes with the weapon they just drew. Rattling Blow Creatures the delinquent critically hits are clumsy 1 and can't make reactions until the end of the delinquent's next turn. Sneak Attack The delinquent deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
